SWN-IMPORTER.IMPORT-BUTTON-TOOLTIP: Import a sector from Sectors Without Number
SWN-IMPORTER.RESULT-DIALOG-CONTENT: The sector {sectorName} has been imported successfully. {journals} journal entries where created in {time} milliseconds.
SWN-IMPORTER.DIALOG-COORDINATES: Generate a label with the coordinates below each hex.
SWN-IMPORTER.DIALOG-NAME: Generate a label with the system name above each hex.
SWN-IMPORTER.DIALOG-NOTES: Generate map pins for every entity. If false, only entities directly orbiting the star/blackhole will have pins.
SWN-IMPORTER.DIALOG-GM: Generate all journal entries as GM-Only. If false, the visibility will depend on the 'hidden' attribute of Sectors Without Number.
SWN-IMPORTER.DIALOG-TYPE: Add a type prefix to every entity journal (ex 'Planet - XYZ').
SWN-IMPORTER.DIALOG-COORD-PREFIX: Prefix system/black-hole holders with coordinates (ex '[0103] System name').
